The fist smashed in to Grimlocks face as he turned around. It was the
first thing he saw. His visor went off, then back on in a few seconds.
Grimlock leaned forward into Dion's face. "PLEASE, don't waste my time
Autoscrap." Grimlock rudely said, as he turned his back on Dion, and
began to walk again. He shook his neck ,as the joint cracked. This
Autobot could hit, Grimlock thought. But not like a Dinobot.
